subject: Re: Updated files ‘The gift of hearing protection’ category LAM catalogue

full_threads.body:
Hi Nikki, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have made the updates, they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://phonakmarketing.com.au/local-marketing/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Thanks Rica,

If you can just change 'love' to 'lover' on this tile.

Thanks Rica,

full_threads.body:
Hi Nikki,

I hope you’re doing well.

I’ve downloaded the "Social Post Gifs and Videos" zip file, but I’m unsure which GIF and MP4 files correspond to the tiles you mentioned, as the files aren’t named according to the tile names.

Additionally, I wasn’t able to locate the PDF for the social content in the folder.

These are the files I downloaded:

Could you please clarify the file names or provide the missing PDF so I can ensure everything is placed correctly?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Guys,


Can I please replace all the current tiles in the 'The gift of hearing protection' category of the https://phonakmarketing.com.au/local-marketing/ catalogue with the following new tiles:
Please note, under each tile add the relevant MP4 and Gif for each. Download content here: Social Post Gifs and videos.zip
Sorry for the push, but if possible, can we have this updated today?


Tile 1 'Social content' - add the PDF


Tile 2 'Gift of peace & quiet'


Tile 3 - Gift for the high flyer


Tile 4 - Gift for the thrill seeker


Tile 5 - Gift for the heavy sleeper


Tile 6 - Gift for the water splasher


Tile 7 - Gift for the heavy-duty worker


Tile 8 - Gift for the music lover


Thanks
Nikki
